description:
A browser customized by Kafan's partner, an expert team from miniblink

Mini Chrome is a browser customized by Kafan's partner, an expert team from miniblink, aiming to resolve some common issues in Chrome. It features:
- Fast: Built on the latest Chromium 87 kernel for faster browsing experience
- Stable: Support multiple versions of IE kernels, suitable for various scenarios
- Compatibility: Compatible with Windows XP for broader system support
- Gestures: Built-in mouse gestures for more efficient operation
- Drag and drop: Support super drag and drop for improved browsing efficiency
- Optimization: Ultimate optimization for smoother experience
- Reliable: Brought to you by the expert team from miniblink - safe, reliable and assured
source: Shanghai Kafan Info Security Co., Ltd.
